summary: Defeat formidable enemies to acquire a new power, forged by an ancient ritual, to call upon the legendary elite assassins of the ancient Dark Brotherhood.
descriptionHtml:
Version 2.0
Defeat formidable enemies to acquire a new power, forged by an ancient ritual, to call upon the legendary elite assassins of the ancient Dark Brotherhood.

Requires latest Skyrim patch.


***************************************
Updates:

Version 2.0
- Each of the 4 Elite Assassins now has a 50% chance of being a male or female.
- The 4 Elite Assassins are now leveled, lowered speed a bit.
- Removed once a day limitation, and added a 10 minute cool down magic effect (or few in-game hours wait).
- Dragon Priests now easier (same as a normal Dragon Priest)
- Added options to the standing stone activator: Earn book (Fight), Receive book (no fight), or Do nothing.

Version 1.1.1
- Lowered speed by a bit.
- Added a male version (Skyrim Nexus).

Version 1.1
- Activating the ritual stone with 4 skulls and the book already in the inventory will give the player 4 filled grand soul gems instead.

Version 1.0
- Initial release

***************************************

Go to your map and look for an altar map marker named "Ancient Ritual Site" (already discovered) just west of Riverwood. Activate the big glowing stone to start. If you choose to fight, you will need to defeat all enemies that spawn, and collect 4 skulls. Then activate the "Ritual Stone" on the ground and you should recieve a book that teaches you the power.

Activating the ritual stone with 4 skulls and the book already in the inventory will give the player 4 filled grand soul gems instead.

The power will spawn (NOT a summon spell) at your location 4 "Elite Assassins" (essential, faster, stronger) that will help you in fights and follow you for 2 minutes. They will have the same stats as a DB initiate (with dual wield katanas and +100 health). This has a 10 minute cool down (magic effect).

***************************************

Steam Workshop Collection: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=18228

Skyrim Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13524
Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=18110

Black Sacrament armor:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5696
author: Flippetized
